Description_lang: Enemies within $a2 yards of you become shrouded in winter, reducing the range of their spells and abilities by $214975s1%.

description_blz.en_US: Enemies within 8 yards of you become shrouded in winter, reducing the range of their spells and abilities by 30%.
description_blz.es_MX: Los enemigos que están en un radio de 8 m de ti quedan en un embozo invernal que reduce el alcance de sus hechizos y habilidades un 30%.
description_blz.pt_BR: Inimigos a 8 m de você ficam amortalhados em inverno, o que reduz em 30% o alcance dos feitiços e das habilidades deles.
description_blz.de_DE: Gegner innerhalb von 8 Metern um Euch werden in Winter gehüllt, was die Reichweite ihrer Zauber und Fähigkeiten um 30% verringert.
description_blz.en_GB: Enemies within 8 yards of you become shrouded in winter, reducing the range of their spells and abilities by 30%.
description_blz.es_ES: El invierno cubre a los enemigos en un radio de 8 m de ti, lo que reduce un 30% el alcance de sus hechizos y facultades.
description_blz.fr_FR: Les ennemis à moins de 8 mètres de vous sont pris dans les filets de l’hiver, ce qui réduit la portée de leurs sorts et techniques de 30%.
description_blz.it_IT: I nemici entro 8 m vengono avvolti dall'inverno e la portata dei loro incantesimi e delle loro abilità si riduce del 30%.
description_blz.ru_RU: Окутывает врагов в радиусе 8 м пеленой зимы, уменьшая радиус действия их заклинаний и способностей на 30%.
description_blz.ko_KR: 8미터 내의 모든 적이 겨울의 장막에 싸여 주문 및 능력의 사정거리가 30%만큼 감소합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 距離你8碼內的敵人會受到寒冬籠罩，使他們法術與技能的距離降低30%。
description_blz.zh_CN: 使你周围8码范围内的敌人被凛冬帷幕所笼罩，令其法术和技能的射程缩短30%。
